No. 51204)} Sub: Incorporation of Names of Independent External Monitors (IEMs) in NITs -reg: It may be mentioned that in obligations of NHAI under the Integrity Pact and having the recommendation of the Central  Vigilance Commission, the following three Independent External Monitors  (IEMs) have been engaged in NHAI vide NHAI Office Order No. ADMIN- 11019/154/2024-0/0 GM(HR / Admin-II) (E- 265447) dated 12.03.2025.Their Contact details are as follows IEM Mobile No. E-mail Dr. Parvez Hayat, IPS (Retd:) (Annexure-I) +91-9810134469 phayatips@gmail.com Sh. Rajvir Singh, IA&AS (Retd:) (Annexure-II) +91-8700466366 singhrajvir@caggov.in Sh. Arun Kumar Gupta, Ex-CMD, SCI (Annexure-III) +91-9833880764 guptaarunsserediffmail.com 23 It has already been stipulated in the Guidelines on the Subject Adoption of revised Integrity Pact (IP) for NHAI Projects circulated vide Policy Circular No. 5.8 dated 29.12.2020 that the Independent External Monitor (IEM) would be, invariably, cited in the NITs. 3_ In view of above, it is reiterated that All Divisions, PIUs and ROs involved in Purchase and Procurement Activities  within NHAIshall ensure strict   adherence to the directions specified in the Guidelines dated December 2020 and ensure the inclusion of IEM Names in all NITs. 4_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl: As stated above (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) Ic Chief General Manager (Coord.)
